thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Norma
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Norma

author: Norma
title: Norma
text: As the title suggests on my recent visit to the store in Manor West Tralee the staff could not have been more helpful. Two young men made every effort imaginable to help me find the runners that I was looking for, Eventually, they ordered them online for me and they were delivered two days later on a Saturday. They were very knowledgeable about the footwear also. I've been to several Lifestyle stores and none compares to the Manor West Tralee.
